|brand = Realtek |model = RTL8723AS Combo Module |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = SDIO (module) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = module
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8723AS |icid = 6317A-RTL8723AS |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723AS; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = bluetooth |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = reference design |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/12/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :{{WiFiCert|WFA14135|04/30/2012}}
Per the FCC manual / spec sheet... *Host Interface **SDIO for WLAN / UART for BT (RTL8723AS) **Multi-function USB for WLAN and BT (RTL8723AU)
Per a CII PC on 07/26/2012.. :This module is used in a notebook / laptop / netbook / tablet :with the model 20175XXXX / 2191XXXX Per a CII PC on 03/29/2013.. :This module is used in the '''Lenovo''' ''IdeaPad Yoga 11S'' and '''Onda''' ''v975w''
Driver [https://github.com/instantaphex/rtl8723as rtl8723as] for the wifi portion is available (see also [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtl8723au rtl8723au]) :No driver for BT part (see also [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtl8723au_bt rtl8723au_bt], [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtl8723bs_bt rtl8723bs_bt])
==See also== *[[Realtek RTL8723AS Combo Module]] :''802.11bgn RTL8723AS Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8723AS TX2-RTL8723AS] (2012-04-12) :Linux driver: [https://github.com/instantaphex/rtl8723as rtl8723as] ([https://github.com/lwfinger/rtl8723ds rtl8723ds]) *[[Realtek RTL8723BS Combo Module (SDIO)]] :''802.11bgn RTL8723BS Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8723BS TX2-RTL8723BS] (2014-05-14) :Linux driver: [https://github.com/hadess/rtl8723bs rtl8723bs], [https://github.com/lwfinger/rtl8723bs_bt rtl8723bs_bt]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
